TopicTitle: This easter egg is way too big...

Articles.Content: The easter egg at the KSC used to be barely visible from the KSC view, but now I feel like it has become a little more obnoxious than would make sense for an easter egg. It was one of the first things I noticed when launching 1.2, so I think it would be best to shrink it, so it at least takes a little bit more searching around in order to find. http://imgur.com/a/pnqLL
On the other hand, it's just big enough to draw a "what's that?" from the player to go investigate, and from there hopefully wonder "Are there any more in this game?"
The first one is always free.

1 hour ago, tg626 said:

On the other hand, it's just big enough to draw a "what's that?" from the player to go investigate, and from there hopefully wonder "Are there any more in this game?"

To me, that's what it was like when it only appeared to be a few pixels big on the screen.
Interesting, I could never see it before...
